meta.og_twtr_desc: News and Events from the Chaminade Campus and Ohana.

content.title: A Step Towards the Future
content.intro: The Hogan Entrepreneurs Program teaches veterans valuable job preparation skills.

content.title: Another Tournament in the Books
content.intro: From a keiki hoops clinic to competing  against top ranked teams, it was an exciting five days.

content.title: Coming Full Circle
content.intro: Donors and scholarship recipients meet at annual mahalo luncheon.

content.title: Ching Hall Dedication
content.intro: The heart of campus receives a facelift thanks to the Clarence T.C. Ching Foundation.

content.title: Lessons from an International Hotelier
content.intro: Raymond Bickson talks to business students about the hotel industry and leadership.

content.title: Nobel Laureate Visits Chaminade
content.intro: Dr. Chalfie talk met with oohs and ahhs as he explains his Nobel Prize winning GFP (Green Fluorescent Protein).

content.title: 'Tis the Season of Giving
content.intro: Your generosity helps students thrive and serve our community.

content.title: SAVE THE DATE
content.intro: Time to plan ahead. Join us in Honolulu for Chaminade's 2017 Alumni Reunion on March 30 through April 2, 2017.
